programme.title: No Word from Mount Olympus
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke wonders how Congress can predict a $3 trillion Treasury surplus in 2010.
programme.medium_synopsis: Whilst Congress tries to pass a huge tax cut before the summer recess, Alistair Cooke wonders how they could possibly predict the state of the economy in 2010.
